#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
int t,n,x,y,X,Y,i;
long s=0;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
scanf("%d",&n);
scanf("%d",&X);
scanf("%d",&Y);
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{
scanf("%d",&x);
scanf("%d",&y);
if(X>x)
s=s+(X-x);
else if(X<x)
s=s+(x-X);
if(Y>y)
s=s+(Y-y);
else if(Y<y)
s=s+(y-Y);
}
printf("%ld\n",2*s);
s=0;
}
return 0;
}
